member.summary: Returns whether the C#BUFFER_FLAG_DECODE_ONLY flag is set.

member.summary: Returns whether the C#BUFFER_FLAG_END_OF_STREAM flag is set.

member.summary: Returns whether the C#BUFFER_FLAG_FIRST_SAMPLE flag is set.

member.param: The flag to add to this buffer's flags, which should be one of the C.BUFFER_FLAG_* constants.

member.summary: Clears the buffer.

member.param: The flags to set, which should be a combination of the C.BUFFER_FLAG_* constants.
member.summary: Replaces this buffer's flags with flags.

member.summary: The number of leading unencrypted bytes in each sub-sample.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.CryptoInfo.NumBytesOfEncryptedData
member.summary: The number of trailing encrypted bytes in each sub-sample.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.CryptoInfo.NumSubSamples
member.summary: The number of subSamples that make up the buffer's contents.

member.summary: Increases the number of clear data for the first sub sample by count.

member.summary: Supplemental data related to the buffer, if #hasSupplementalData() returns true.

member.summary: The time at which the sample should be presented.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.DecoderInputBuffer.WaitingForKeys
member.summary: Whether the last attempt to read a sample into this buffer failed due to not yet having the DRM keys associated with the next sample.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.DecoderInputBuffer.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The BufferReplacementMode replacement mode.
member.summary: Creates a new instance.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.DecoderInputBuffer.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: The BufferReplacementMode replacement mode.

If non-zero, #ensureSpaceForWrite(int) will ensure that the buffer is this number of bytes larger than the requested length. This can be useful for decoders that consume data in fixed size blocks, for efficiency. Setting the padding size to the decoder's fixed read size is necessary to prevent such a decoder from trying to read beyond the end of the buffer.
member.summary: Creates a new instance.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.DecoderInputBuffer.IsEncrypted
member.summary: Returns whether the C#BUFFER_FLAG_ENCRYPTED flag is set.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.DecoderInputBuffer.EnsureSpaceForWrite(System.Int32)
member.param: The length of the write that must be accommodated, in bytes.
member.summary: Ensures that #data is large enough to accommodate a write of a given length at its current position.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.DecoderInputBuffer.Flip
member.summary: Flips #data and #supplementalData in preparation for being queued to a decoder.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.DecoderInputBuffer.NewNoDataInstance
member.summary: Returns a new instance that's not able to hold any data.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.DecoderInputBuffer.ResetSupplementalData(System.Int32)
member.param: The length of the supplemental data that must be accommodated, in bytes.
member.summary: Clears #supplementalData and ensures that it's large enough to accommodate length bytes.

member.summary: Output buffer decoded by a Decoder.

member.summary: Configuration for a decoder to allow it to decode encrypted media data.

member.name: T:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.IDecoder
member.param: The type of buffer input to the decoder.
The type of buffer output from the decoder.
The type of exception thrown from the decoder.
member.summary: A media decoder.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.IDecoder.DequeueInputBuffer
member.summary: Dequeues the next input buffer to be filled and queued to the decoder.
member.returns: The input buffer, which will have been cleared, or null if a buffer isn't available.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.IDecoder.DequeueOutputBuffer
member.summary: Dequeues the next output buffer from the decoder.
member.returns: The output buffer, or null if an output buffer isn't available.

member.summary: Flushes the decoder.

member.param: The input buffer.
member.summary: Queues an input buffer to the decoder.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.IDecoder.Release
member.summary: Releases the decoder.

member.name: T:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.SimpleDecoder
member.summary: Base class for Decoders that use their own decode thread and decode each input buffer immediately into a corresponding output buffer.

member.param: An array of nulls that will be used to store references to input buffers.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Decoder.VideoDecoderOutputBuffer.Init(System.Int64,System.Int32,Java.Nio.ByteBuffer)
member.param: The presentation timestamp for the buffer, in microseconds.
The output mode. One of C#VIDEO_OUTPUT_MODE_NONE, C#VIDEO_OUTPUT_MODE_YUV and C#VIDEO_OUTPUT_MODE_SURFACE_YUV.
Supplemental data associated with the frame, or null if not present. It is safe to reuse the provided buffer after this method returns.
member.summary: Initializes the buffer.

member.summary: Configures the buffer for the given frame dimensions when passing actual frame data via #decoderPrivate.

member.summary: Resizes the buffer based on the given stride.
member.returns: Whether the buffer was resized successfully.
